full_summary:
# Janitorial Services Tender Notice

## Solicitation Number
5P300-23-0115/A

## Contracting Authority
Parks Canada

## Contracting Authority Address
PO Box 130, Rocky Harbour, NL A0K 4N0, Canada

## Contact Person
Bonnie Knott, Contracting Authority
Email: [bonnie.knott@pc.gc.ca](mailto:bonnie.knott@pc.gc.ca)
Phone: (709) 636-4953

## Tender Details

* **Contract Title**: Janitorial Services - Parks Canada Collections and Curatorial Centre
* **Location**: 555 Av. des Entreprises, Gatineau, QC
* **Contract Period**: October 2, 2023 to October 1, 2024, with option to extend for (2) two additional years
* **Contract Requirements**: The successful bidder will provide janitorial services for the Parks Canada Collections and Curatorial Centre, located in Gatineau, QC.

## Instructions to Bidders

* **Method of Bid Submission**: Bids will be accepted by email or fax only.
* **Acceptable Email Address**: soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca
* **Acceptable Fax Number**: 1-877-558-2349
* **Maximum Email File Size**: 15 megabytes

## Security Requirement

* **Personnel Security Clearance**: New personnel security clearance requests will require mandatory fingerprints to initiate the criminal record check. Existing security clearances issued by the Government of Canada are not affected.

## Optional Site Visit

* **Date and Time**: September 15, 2023, 1 PM Eastern Daylight Time
* **Requirements**: Representatives must complete a site orientation course found at PX3 (talentlms.com) and email the certificate to the Contracting Authority by September 13, 2023.
* **Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) Required**: Safety boots, hard hats, high-visibility vests, and eye protection.

## Enquiries and Clarifications

* **Technical and Contractual Enquiries**: To be submitted to the Contracting Authority, in writing and received no later than 5 calendar days prior to the tender closing date.
* **Contractor Responsibility**: The contractor is responsible for ensuring compliance with all regulations, laws, and rules governing the National Park Act.

## Tender Documents

* **Availability**: Tender documents are available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service at http://canad
